Development Support Tools

This chapter describes some of the tools and libraries provided by ECLiPSe that assist in program development and the analysis of program runtime behaviour.
  • Available Tools and Libraries
  • Heuristic Program Checker
  • Document Generation Tools
  • Cross Referencing Tool
  • Pretty Printer Tool
  • Timing Profiler
  • Port Profiler
  • Line coverage
    • Compilation
    • Results
  • Mode analysis
